additional_info:
Telephone, Internet, Cable-TV, Security, Alarm System, Elevator, Generator, Heating - Conditioning, Heating system: electricity 
 Office for rent in Tbilisi in a prestigious office building, on Marjanishvili St. # 5 (in close proximity to Marjanishivili Theater and TBC Bank). The office is located on the 4th floor conveniently accessible by elevator and stairs. The office is 22 sq. meters. Price: $25/sq. meter totaling $550 USD / month equivalent in Georgian Lari. The price includes the following: 1 parking spot (additional pay parking available) 24-hour security, secured entrance video surveillance, VAT, electricity (including backup power with private generator), heating, cleaning, water and other utility related expenses.
